system_description: Deploy with 2 [missiles] that are launched every ten attacks
Deploy with 1 [missile] that launchs at stealth targets first
Windup for 6 seconds, then attack rapidly for 18 seconds down the lane
After charging for 6 seconds, deploy a kinetic field that reduces non-elemental damage for 10 seconds with a range of 1
Add a laser to every auto-attack
Add a shock to every auto-attack
Start each battle with double shields that decay until you are at max shields
